description: New-School Noir   The Curse of the Tempest Jewel  with  Private Eye      Two Chicago filmmakers filter the traditions of film noir and hardboiled detective stories through a Chicago-style lens and deliver two films with exciting voices, igniting personalities and a new-school brand of noir that is unlike anything you?ve seen before. The Curse of the Tempest Jewel  reinvigorates a traditional film noir setting, 1940s Chicago, with an cast of seventeen actors with Down syndrome. As the private detectives and denizens of the city, the ensemble cast embark on a quest for the legendary Tempest Jewel, lost at sea centuries earlier.
